chapters.title: Chapter 15: What Can Be Learned in Dreams
chapters.info: Sierin Vayu, p. 301 (214)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah who was raised Amyrlin Seat shortly after Gitara Moroso's Foretelling of the Rebirth of the Dragon and Moiraine's and Siuan's raising to the shawl. Moiraine said she had more than a touch of Red in her, and was thus never told of the work they were doing to prepare to find the Dragon Reborn. See also Amyrlin Seat.
